nodes.text: The Silver Star was a G9 Rigger-class light freighter produced by the Corellian Engineering Corporation. During the Galactic Civil War, the Silver Star was captained by Saral Aenet, and was attacked by a Pathfinder-class scout ship carrying bounty hunters hired by Erron Irbian.
At this time, the ship contained the Holocron of Suljo Warde in a secret compartment in the ship's cockpit.
